summary: The client reported that a previous deletion of a vision draft failed and requested it again. PM Sarah apologized, double-checked, and successfully force-deleted the draft with ID BrightHR-Lite-DELME2-Vision-Draft_20251021_152745, confirming no visions remain saved.

decisions.title: Proceed with force-deletion of the vision draft

backlog_deltas.title: Removed draft vision after failed initial deletion
